name: Bitty Bat AND the 1000 Gates
description: An incredibly short game about boolean logic gates. The premise being a young bat has to navigate a series of logic gates to get to school. I made an earlier version of this with half as many gates in November, but recently decided to expand it to include all the basic logic gates. I designed the gates to resemble both literal gates and symbols on circuit diagrams. Also, since graduating I guess I can't host this on the University's servers forever, right?
